Wheeljack-X::

"Gotcha, boss!"  Jackie deposits Blackfang on the table, then starts 
fiddling with several gadgets that seem to materialize from thin air 
in his hands.  In no time at all, he's built a temporary spark 
compartment.  "Now for the really tricky part: we gotta get 
Blackfang's spark into this thing.  Here goes ..."

He starts to work.  The life-or-death scenario has altered him from 
the class clown to an almost Vulcan-like seriousness.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus gets on one of the med bay tables.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Ok, Wheeljack, lets save Blackfang.
